name: Cadre Holdings, Inc.
description: Cadre Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of safety and security solutions, specializing in the design and manufacturing of high-quality products for the military, law enforcement, and consumer markets. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, Cadre Holdings operates with a commitment to innovation, quality, and performance. The company offers a diverse range of products including tactical gear, law enforcement equipment, and personal protective equipment. Cadre Holdings is known for its advanced technologies and user-centric design, ensuring that their products meet the rigorous demands of their users. The company markets its products through a variety of brands, each tailored to specific segments within the safety and security industry. As a key player in the protective gear market, Cadre Holdings is dedicated to enhancing the effectiveness and safety of its clients, focusing on continuous improvement and customer satisfaction. With a robust supply chain and a team of experienced professionals, the company is well-positioned to capitalize on growth opportunities in both domestic and international markets, driven by an increasing demand for safety and security solutions.
